thread.title_full: JNU Recruitment 2017 – JRF & Research Associate Posts

author: freejobalert.com
title: JNU Recruitment 2017 – JRF & Research Associate Posts

organizations.name: centre for study of regional devlopment

text: Click here for Research Associate Post Details JNU Recruitment 2017 – Jr Research Fellow Posts: School of Environmental Sciences, Jawaharlal Nehru University (JNU) has issued a notification for the recruitment of Junior Research Fellow vacancies for the project “Rock types and morphological signature detection of MARS to infer natural resources” on temporary basis. Eligible candidates can apply in the prescribed application format on or before 05-02-2017. Other details like educational qualification & how to apply are given below… JNU Vacancy Details: Totalk No of Posts: 01 Name of the Post: Junior Research Fellow Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess 1st class M.Sc in Environmental Sciences with NET/GATE or equivalent qualification. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may send their detailed CV to Prof. S. Mukherjee, P.I. (Mangalyaan Project), Dean, School of Environmental Sciences, Jawaharlal Nehru University on or before 05-02-2017. Last Date for Submission of Application: 05-02-2017. For more details like emoluments, period, period of the project & other information click on the link given below…. Click here for Recruitment Advt – JNU Recruitment 2017 – Research Associate Posts: Centre for the Study of Regional Development, School of Social Science, Jawaharlal Nehru University (JNU), New Delhi has invited applications for the recruitment of Research Associate vacancies for the project titled “Economic Reform and Industrial Performance: Study of Indian Engineering Industry” on temporary basis. Eligible candidates can apply in prescribed application format on or before 25-01-2017. Other details like educational qualification & how to apply are given below… JNU Vacancy Details: Total No of Posts: 01 Name of the Posts: Research Associate Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess Master Degree in any social science discipline. How to Apply: Eligible candidates can send their applications on plain paper with indicating name, date of birth/age, address, essential/ technical/professional qualifications, experience, research work, list of published books/articles should reach the office of Assistant Professor. Suresh R., Project Director, School Social Sciences (Centre for Study of Regional Devlopment), Jawaharlal Nehru University, New Delhi-110067, Email: sureshrjnu@gmail.com on or before 25-01-2017. Last Date for Receipt of Application: 25-01-2017. For more details like job requirements & other information click on the link given below….
